summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Hamlet Avenue from 53rd Avenue South to 54th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8387 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
